54
RDF and RDF Schema
SPARQL query forms: ASK
@prefix foaf:       <http://xmlns.com/foaf/0.1/> .
_:a  foaf:name       "Alice" .
_:a  foaf:homepage   <http://work.example.org/alice/> .
_:b  foaf:name       "Bob" .
_:b  foaf:mbox       <mailto:bob@work.example> .
PREFIX foaf:    <http://xmlns.com/foaf/0.1/>
ASK
{ ?x foaf:name  "Alice" }
yes
Query result:
speaker: SYSTEM
